Validation guidelines ensure that models are accurate, reliable, and fit for their intended purpose by outlining standards for assessing their conceptual soundness, implementation, and performance. Guidelines also establish a structured approach for identifying and mitigating model risks, ensuring compliance with regulatory and internal governance requirements.

1. Hover over the title of a risk area you want to add a guideline to until the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** menu appears, then click on it.

1. Select **{{< fa plus >}} Add Guideline**.

1. Provide a **[title]{.smallcaps}** and **[description]{.smallcaps}** for your guideline.

1. Click **Add Guideline** to save your changes.
